Params: {1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "The recording switch... Here, maybe? Oh, it's already on...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The man in the frame walks to the office chair and lowers himself into it. He tugs at his lab coat, tightening it around his gaunt frame like a shroud.'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: "I'm Thomas Hell. From now on, I'll... ahem...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Realizing his voice is tight with excitement, he licks his lips, hesitates briefly, then grabs the glass of water from the desk and downs it in one gulp.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: "From now on, I'll be recording my experiment logs on video.", 4: '1'}

{3: 'The man leans toward the camera, his face slightly warped by the wide-angle lens. His eyes burn with an unnatural intensity, their gleam cutting through the pixelated haze of the screen—bright, almost feverish.'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: "I don't even know how to describe what I'm feeling right now...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: 'This is such a crucial opportunity. I will... no, I must succeed.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The man rises from his chair and slowly approaches a cylindrical chamber nearby.'}
{3: 'Perched atop a pedestal within the chamber rests a shard, resembling nothing more than an ordinary stone one might find along any roadside.'}
{3: 'But Thomas knows the infinite possibilities harbored within this shard, all because it comes from...'}
{3: 'His voice is firm, devout as a prayer.'}
{3: 'He gives a slow spin in his office chair, letting his body settle naturally against the backrest.'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: 'Guess I should make future logs more formal. My mentor always stressed the importance of rigor... Ahem, back to the topic.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: 'The 14th experiment has concluded. Still no progress, as expected.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: 'This is just the brief darkness before dawn. The situation will improve soon.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He runs a hand over the rough stubble shadowing his chin, his voice low and grave.'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: 'No time to waste. I still have much to do.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The man sits in silence for a long while. The quiet grows heavy, thickening the air until it feels as though he might drown in it.'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: 'I was prepared for this, but...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He throws himself back into the stagnant waters of silence.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Thomas picks up the stack of experimental data from the table beside him, scanning the numbers once more, though he's already checked them countless times."}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: 'The Gibbs variables... power output... conversion results... the Zhang function...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: "Why can't I get the expected outcome in practice when using the value obtained by reversing the formula?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: 'No... this is wrong... completely wrong!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He throws the papers violently to the ground, fingers raking through his unkempt hair in desperation.'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: 'The Hetero Tower defies everything we thought was possible. I was a fool to trust those old theories.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: 'Those so-called wise predecessors were nothing but a bunch of mediocrities!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: 'Dominik was nothing special after all!!!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: "I'm going to... derive a new formula.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: 'Time will be mine to command.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After reaching this conclusion, Thomas silently rises and turns off the camera.'}
{3: 'The camera flickers on for a moment, then off again.'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: 'Researcher... hah. Who else but a lunatic like me would do these experiments?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: "It's risky, but... I want to give it a try.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: "If my mentor knew what I was thinking, she'd be furious.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: 'But in the end, someone mediocre like me can only resort to this kind of method...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'His words gradually fade away, yet his bloodshot eyes glimmer with the ghost of a smile.'}
{3: 'His thoughts drift back to long ago, when he wore not the white coat of an experienced researcher, but the humble garb of a still-green student.'}
{3: 'During a tranquil afternoon in the academic building, Thomas clutches his papers and eases open an office door with cautious hands.'}
{3: "He isn't sure if the occupant is resting—or even wants to be disturbed—so he holds his breath and steps inside on light feet."}
{3: 'There, behind the broad expanse of her desk sits his mentor, Ms. Valentina. She seems in a trance, her gaze lost in the depths of a photograph.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Thomas' gaze unconsciously follows his mentor's, landing on that group photo of four people. He recognizes only two—his mentor herself and Ms. Schwartz."}
{3: 'Of the remaining two, one is a kind-faced middle-aged man, and the other a young person from Kowloong.'}

{1: '1', 3: 'Something about the scene holds Thomas transfixed. An indescribable tension hangs between them like an invisible wall, making him hesitate to interrupt Valentina and pull her back to reality.'}
{3: "Thomas doesn't respond right away, taking a moment to realize Valentina is talking about the people in the photo."}
{2: 'Valentina', 3: 'They are the people who changed this world.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Valentina', 3: 'Compared to them, most people in this world are just mediocre, myself included.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: "You're being too modest, Ms. Valentina. The director of the Science Council could never be considered mediocre.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Valentina chuckls at his words and waves her hand at the young man, her voice tinged with melancholy.'}
{3: 'Thomas shakes his head, as if trying to dislodge the memories. His gaze falls to the papers strewn across the floor, and he squeezes his eyes shut in anguish.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Thomas Hell', 3: "You're right, Ms. Valentina... How am I not mediocre?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Only now does he understand what his mentor meant by "mediocre," and...'}
{3: 'Crimson alarms shriek throughout the laboratory, wrenching Thomas awake from unconsciousness, who finds his body sprawled on the floor.'}
{3: 'As he fights to piece together the last moments, a knife-sharp headache splits his skull, scattering his thoughts.'}
{3: 'In his daze, he only recalls a few blurry fragments.'}
{3: 'Space splintering like glass. A deafening explosion. And laughter—cold, mocking, cruel...'}
{3: "Wind screams past his ears as the man suddenly understands—he's falling from the sky."}
{3: "With no time to question why he's here, the man reacts on instinct."}
{3: 'Crimson energy crackles around him, surging from his body as swirling red particles engulf his form.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'In an instant, his figure twists and expands until a red demon looms in the air, his massive wings beating to steady the descent.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The ground trembles as he lands, dust billowing around him. Then, just as quickly, the red demon shifts back to his human form.'}
{3: 'The white-haired man in a red coat surveys his surroundings, only to be met with the bleak expanse of desolated ruins.'}
{3: 'A white-haired man in a dark blue coat with green patterns also turns his gaze toward the ruins, where red-glowing mechanoids approach ominously.'}
{3: 'The commotion of the landing has attracted the attention of these Corrupted.'}
